title: MONSTER SEASON 5 PLAT LF SUPPORT DUO
body: Currently silver 3 off placements , I am a monster ADC and can single hamdedly carry games given the tools to. Looking for a support to power our way through to high plat

replies.body: Was plat 5 last season, post promos in gold 3, add me if you'd like, I play at somewhat random times, but I'm usually doing ranked.
add Flash Master main thresh/morg lets see how monster you are i am plat 5 didt finish placements yet (71% win rate on my morg) i be home in 4 hours
